00024 void GPS::loadConfiguration( const mrpt::utils::CConfigFileBase & config, const std::string & sectionName) {
00025 
00026         std::string portName = config.read_string(sectionName,"COM_port_LIN","/dev/ttyS0");
00027         std::string vendor = config.read_string(sectionName, "GPS_TYPE", "Novatel" );
00028 
00029         if( GPSStringer::NOVATEL == vendor ) {
00030                 this->gpsStrings = new NovatelGPSStringer( portName );
00031         } else if( GPSStringer::POCKETMAX == vendor ) {
00032                 this->gpsStrings = new PocketMaxGPSStringer( portName );
00033         } else {
00034                 LOG_GPS(FATAL) << "Unsupported vendor" << endl;
00035         }
00036 
00037         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Connecting to port " << portName << endl;
00038         this->setSerialPortName ( portName );
00039         this->loadConfig(config, sectionName);
00040 
00041         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using " << vendor << " GPS" << endl;
00042 
00043         this->isGpggaUsed = config.read_bool(sectionName,"use_gga", true);
00044 
00045         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using gpgga: " << (this->isGpggaUsed?"TRUE":"FALSE") << endl;
00046 
00047         this->isGprmcUsed = config.read_bool(sectionName,"use_rmc", false);
00048 
00049         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using gprmc: " << (this->isGprmcUsed?"TRUE":"FALSE") << endl;
00050 
00051         this->baudRate = config.read_int(sectionName,"baudRate", 57600);
00052 
00053         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using " << this->baudRate << " baud" << endl;
00054 
00055         this->processRate = config.read_int(sectionName,"process_rate", 1);
00056 
00057         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using a process rate of " << this->processRate << endl;
00058 
00059         this->testLat = config.read_float(sectionName, "testLat", 0,0);
00060 
00061         this->testLon = config.read_float(sectionName, "testLon", 0,0);
00062 
00063 
00064 }

00066 void GPS::init() {
00067         initializeCom();
00068 
00069         while(!lstObs.size()) {
00070                 doProcess();
00071                 LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Getting GPS observations" << endl;
00072                 mrpt::system::sleep(200);
00073                 getObservations(lstObs);
00074                 //this->isGPS_signalAcquired()
00075         }
00076 
00077         gpsData = CObservationGPSPtr(lstObs.begin()->second);
00078 
00079         if(!gpsData.pointer()->has_GGA_datum)
00080                 LOG_GPS(WARNING) << "gpsData.pointer()->has_GGA_datum fails" << endl;
00081         if(!gpsData.pointer()->has_RMC_datum)
00082                 LOG_GPS(WARNING) << "gpsData.pointer()->has_RMC_datum fails" << endl;
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 void GPS::sensorProcess() {
00087         doProcess();
00088         getObservations( lstObs );
00089 
00090         if (lstObs.empty())
00091                 LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "[Test_GPS] Waiting for data..." << endl;
00092 
00093         for(itObs = lstObs.begin(); itObs != lstObs.end(); itObs++){
00094 
00095                 gpsData=CObservationGPSPtr(itObs->second);
00096 
00097                 if(!gpsData.pointer()->has_GGA_datum)
00098                         LOG_GPS(WARNING) << "gpsData.pointer()->has_GGA_datum fails" << endl;
00099                 if(!gpsData.pointer()->has_RMC_datum)
00100                         LOG_GPS(WARNING) << "gpsData.pointer()->has_RMC_datum fails" << endl;
00101         }
00102 }

00104 SensorData * GPS::getData() {
00105         double lat;
00106         double lon;
00107         bool valid = false;
00108 
00109         if(gpsData.pointer()->has_GGA_datum) {
00110                 lat = gpsData.pointer()->GGA_datum.latitude_degrees;
00111                 lon = gpsData.pointer()->GGA_datum.longitude_degrees;
00112                 valid = true;
00113         } else if(gpsData.pointer()->has_RMC_datum) {
00114                 lat = gpsData.pointer()->RMC_datum.latitude_degrees;
00115                 lon = gpsData.pointer()->RMC_datum.longitude_degrees;
00116                 valid = true;
00117         }
00118 
00119         return new GPSData( lat, lon, valid );
00120 }

00137                 //this->appendObservation(gpsData);//This probably wont be used
00138         }

00143                 if( gpsData->has_GGA_datum ) {
00144                         out << "GGA: " << gpsData->GGA_datum.latitude_degrees << ", " << gpsData->GGA_datum.longitude_degrees << endl;
00145                 }
00146

00148                         out << "RMC: " << gpsData->RMC_datum.latitude_degrees << ", " << gpsData->RMC_datum.longitude_degrees << endl;

00152                 out << "test lat = " << testLat << " test lon = " << testLon << endl;

00154                                 << " meters" << endl;
00155 
00156         }
00157         out.precision(p);
00158         out << "************" << endl;
00159 }

00161 GPS::~GPS() {
00162         delete this->gpsStrings;
00163         this->gpsStrings = NULL;

00166 double GPS::GetDistanceToWaypoint (double lat, double lon) const{
00167         return AbstractNavigationInterface::haversineDistance(lat, lon, GetGpsLatitude(), GetGpsLongitude());
00168 }
00169 
00170 double GPS::GetDistanceToWaypoint (double lat1, double lon1, double lat2, double lon2) const{
00171         return AbstractNavigationInterface::haversineDistance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2);
00172 }

00174 double GPS::GetGpsSpeed() const{
00175         const double knotToMph = 0.868976242;
00176         if (gpsData->has_RMC_datum)
00177                 return (gpsData->RMC_datum.speed_knots * knotToMph);
00178         else return 0.0;
00179 }
00180 
00181 double GPS::GetGpsDirection() const{
00182 
00183         if (gpsData->has_RMC_datum)
00184                 return gpsData->RMC_datum.direction_degrees;
00185 
00186         else
00187                 LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "No GPS_RMC_datum to return" << endl;
00188         return 0.0;
00189 }

00191 double GPS::GetGpsLatitude() const{
00192         if (gpsData->has_GGA_datum)
00193                 return gpsData->GGA_datum.latitude_degrees;
00194 
00195         return 0.0;
00196 }
00197 
00198 double GPS::GetGpsLongitude() const{
00199         if (gpsData->has_GGA_datum)
00200                 return gpsData->GGA_datum.longitude_degrees;
00201 
00202         return 0.0;
00203 }

00205 CPoint2D GPS::GetCurrentGpsLocation() const{
00206         CPoint2D curPos;
00207         curPos.m_coords[0] = GetGpsLatitude();
00208         curPos.m_coords[1] = GetGpsLongitude();
00209 
00210         return curPos;
00211 }

00217 void GPS::initializeCom() {
00218         // check if connection is already established, if not, reconnect
00219         //if (this->isGPS_connected()) {return; }
00220 
00221         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Connecting to GPS ... (./YClopsLib/GPS)" << endl;
00222 
00223         CSerialPort myCom(this->gpsStrings->portName);
00224 
00225         myCom.setConfig(this->baudRate,0,8,1,false);
00226 
00227         LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Post open" << endl;
00228 
00229         stringstream inputStream;
00230 
00231         //clear out the commands that constantly update the gps data
00232         bool to = false;
00233 
00234         inputStream << this->gpsStrings->clearCommand << "\n\r";
00235         myCom.Write(inputStream.str().c_str(),inputStream.str().length());
00236         sleep(1);
00237         myCom.purgeBuffers();
00238 
00239         string response = myCom.ReadString( 1000, &to, "\n\r" );
00240 
00241         if( this->gpsStrings->clearCommandResponse != response.substr(0,this->gpsStrings->clearCommandResponse.length()) || to ) {
00242                 LOG_GPS(FATAL) << "Misconfigured " << this->gpsStrings->vendor << " GPS.\nRecieved: " << response << endl;
00243         }
00244 
00245         if( this->isGpggaUsed ) {
00246                 LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using gpgga" << endl;
00247                 inputStream.str("");
00248                 inputStream << this->gpsStrings->ggaCommand << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00249                 myCom.Write(inputStream.str().c_str(),inputStream.str().length());//this will tell the gps to get a satellite reading once a second
00250         }
00251 
00252         if( this->isGprmcUsed ) {
00253                 LOG_GPS(DEBUG3) << "Using gprmc" << endl;
00254                 inputStream.str("");
00255                 inputStream << this->gpsStrings->rmcCommand << this->processRate << "\n\r";
00256                 myCom.Write(inputStream.str().c_str(),inputStream.str().length());//this will tell the gps to run the nmea rmc command once a second
00257         }
00258 
00259         myCom.close();
00260 }
